quickstart-cli.documentation: Smithy Quickstart example weather service using the Smithy CLI.

quickstart-gradle.documentation: Smithy Quickstart example weather service using the Smithy-Gradle-Plugin.

custom-linter.documentation: Gradle project to create a custom, configurable model linter.

custom-validator.documentation: Gradle project to create a custom model validator.

decorators.documentation: Gradle project to create a custom  decorator for validation events.
